markdown:
<title level="1" right="Trait">[Electricity](/Traits.aspx?ID=56)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 631 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

Effects with this trait deal electricity damage. A creature with this trait has a magical connection to electricity.
name: Electricity
